claude-md-sync.description: Automatically keeps CLAUDE.md synchronized with project state. Detects project type, analyzes current state, and proposes documentation updates.

claude-mem0.description: Persistent memory for Claude Code using mem0 cloud API. Automatically captures and retrieves global user-level and project-level memories.

gui-agent-dev.description: Development toolkit for GUI automation agents with /dev command (6-step workflow), 8 agents, and code review skill

plugin-updater.description: Check for updates to installed Claude Code plugins from the developer-kits marketplace
